lead_paragraph: A man suspected of fatally shooting former National Football League player Joe McKnight in a road rage incident near New Orleans has been arrested and charged with manslaughter, a Louisiana sheriff said on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: Sheriff Charges Manslaughter in Louisiana Death of Ex-NFL Player
headline.main: Sheriff Charges Manslaughter in Louisiana Death of Ex-NFL Player

snippet: A man suspected of fatally shooting former National Football League player Joe McKnight in a road rage incident near New Orleans has been arrested and charged with manslaughter, a Louisiana sheriff said on Tuesday....
